name: Sproot (team.mmorgb)
description:
Sproot, is an adorable puzzle game that challenges players to build a system of roots in order to collect water and nutrients to grow a plant. Together with Professor Leporidae, who shares fascinating plant facts, players will tackle challenges inspired by the very plants they aim to cultivate…

This version was created for the Georgia Game Developers Association annual Best in Georgia Competition.  We hope to continue to make improvements to the game, and add even more levels!

Read more about team mmoRGB at mmorgb.com
